content: try out this free goose coaster pattern link to the youtube video https //www youtube com/watch v=jkthfymwpve skill level easy this pattern does not include crochet lessons but if you know the basic stitches you should be good the pattern does involve sewing the pieces together format pdf and youtube video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn -white and orange -yarn needle -stitch marker -safety eyes -scissors -stuffing final size - the diameter is 10 cm
